electronic-condo-proxies.title: Quorum - Electronic Proxy Forms For Condominium Shareholder Meetings
electronic-condo-proxies.snippet: I'm a director at my condo corporation. And like many other condos, we've struggled to reach quorum at our owner meetings. That was until this year when we decided to experiment with basic email marketing and electronic proxy forms. Now our condo never has to worry about missing quorum again.
electronic-condo-proxies.author: JJ Hiew
electronic-condo-proxies.description: Quorum - Electronic Proxy Forms For Condominium Shareholder Meetings

harpjs-and-github-pages.title: A better way to deploy HarpJS compiled sites to Github Pages
harpjs-and-github-pages.snippet: If you're publishing HarpJS sites to Github pages, then you've probably had to deal with a mess with the offical documented Github Deployment instructions. Here's a better way to handle it using Git Submodules.
harpjs-and-github-pages.author: JJ Hiew
harpjs-and-github-pages.description: A better way to deploy HarpJS compiled sites to Github Pages

cloverawards.title: Clover Awards -- A case study on awesomeness.
cloverawards.snippet: Clover Awards is a crowd-powered social enterprise platform that rewards the commitment, effort and talent of everyday heroes through recognition and financial support for their individual causes. It is a responsive web app built using NodeJS and AngularJS with PayPal and Stripe payment processor integration.
cloverawards.author: JJ Hiew
cloverawards.description: Clover Awards -- A case study on awesomeness.
